description: This file defines the EventRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository to provide database operations for Event entities. It includes a custom method findByCategory to retrieve events based on their category.

classes.name: EventRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Event entities, providing CRUD operations and custom query method findByCategory.

methods.name: findByCategory
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Event objects that belong to the specified EventCategory.
